Title: The Message
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Lamar Abrams, Hellen Jo, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Deedee Magno
Plot: The wailing stone is receiving a message, but the Gems can't make it out so Greg tries to help out.
